Module worldofzuul
Package worldofzuul.item

Class pHNeutralizers

java.lang.Object
worldofzuul.Sprite
worldofzuul.SpriteAnimation
worldofzuul.item.Item
worldofzuul.item.pHNeutralizers
public class pHNeutralizers
extends Item
The type P h neutralizers. Not used in game. Used to adjust the pH of a Field.
